analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/32/0xa549b1209a7ccadf8bfc654fc8a373d62c4e5873.sol:
	Contract Metadollar has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/32/0xa549b1209a7ccadf8bfc654fc8a373d62c4e5873.sol#209)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/32/0xa549b1209a7ccadf8bfc654fc8a373d62c4e5873.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/32/0xa549b1209a7ccadf8bfc654fc8a373d62c4e5873.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/32/0xa549b1209a7ccadf8bfc654fc8a373d62c4e5873.sol#79) is not in mixedCase
